com.nttdocomo.ui
Interface MediaImage

All Superinterfaces:
MediaResource
public interface MediaImage
extends MediaResource

This defines the media image.
This media image interface is used to handle media resources as images.
A media image is obtained by using a method of the MediaManager class. The type of class object to be returned is implementation dependent. The media image is displayed using the VisualPresenter component or used by retrieving the Image object.

See Also:
MediaManager, VisualPresenter

Method Summary
 int getHeight()
          This obtains the image height.
 Image getImage()
          This obtains an image object from the media image.
 int getWidth()
          This obtains the image width.
 
Methods inherited from interface com.nttdocomo.ui.MediaResource
dispose, unuse, use
 

Method Detail

getImage

public Image getImage()
This obtains an image object from the media image. It returns null when a media image cannot be transformed into an image object. It is guaranteed that only one image object can be retrieved from the media image. Therefore, please note that even if this method is called several times, the same image object is returned. When a media image is disposed of, the image object retrieved from the media image becomes invalid whether or not an object exists that refers to said object.

Returns:
An image object.

getWidth

public int getWidth()
This obtains the image width.

getHeight

public int getHeight()
This obtains the image height.
